Description:
We are currently seeking a skilled SAP ABAP Consultant to join our team in Khobar, Saudi Arabia. As an SAP ABAP Consultant, you will be responsible for developing, implementing, and maintaining SAP applications using the ABAP programming language. You will work closely with our clients to understand their business requirements and customize SAP solutions to meet their needs. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background in SAP ABAP and a solid understanding of SAP modules such as FI/CO, MM, SD, and HR.Responsibilities:Design, develop, and debug SAP ABAP programs and reports based on business requirements
Create and modify SAP forms such as Smart Forms and SAPscript
Develop and maintain SAP interfaces using IDocs, BAPIs, and RFCs
Perform unit testing and support system integration testing
Provide technical support and troubleshoot SAP ABAP issues
Collaborate with functional consultants to understand client requirements and propose technical solutions
Document technical specifications and system configurations
Participate in project meetings and provide regular status updates
Stay up-to-date with SAP ABAP trends and best practicesSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
4-6 years of experience in SAP ABAP development
Strong knowledge of SAP modules such as FI/CO, MM, SD, and HR
Experience with SAP S/4HANA is a plus
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
Strong communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines
Experience with SAP Fiori/UI5 development is a plus

Strong knowledge of SAP ABAP programming language
Experience with SAP modules such as FI/CO, MM, SD, and HR
Knowledge of SAP development tools such as ABAP Workbench and Eclipse
Experience with SAP forms development using Smart Forms and SAP script.
Understanding of SAP integration technologies such as IDocs, BAPIs, and RFCs
Rich experience in SAP- ABAP Programming with SD, MM, FICO, PP,
Worked on ABAPHANA to display the CDS view as a report using SAP standard classes.
